newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING - Optisystems Solutions Inc.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING - Optisystems Solutions Inc.

text.p: Optisystems Solutions Ltd filed Friday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission an initial public offering of up to two million ordinary shares and two million redeemable warrants to purchase ordinary shares.
The Tel Aviv-based maker of products designed to enhance computer software said the shares are expected to sell between $7.50 and $8.50 each.
National Securities Corp will underwrite the offering, with an over-allotment option of up to 200,000 shares and warrants.
Proceeds from the sale will be used to finance research and development needs, for worldwide marketing and other general corporate needs.
After the sale, the company will have six million ordinary shares outstanding and two million warrants outstanding.
In 1996, the company reported a net loss of $566,037, compared to net income of $778,386 a year earlier.
